thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Marty Witrock
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Marty Witrock

author: Marty Witrock
title: Marty Witrock
text: I have a BOSS LS 1416 CO2 laser and I'm completely impressed with its performance thus far. I've been engraving Yeti travel mugs, beer mugs, wine glasses, stainless travel mugs, wedding accessories, knife handles and a variety of advertising/promotional items (keychains, coasters, etc) and the ease and quality of the output using this machine is incredible. As a newbie, I also learned what not to do and ended up replacing my focal lens because of it. The staff at BOSS have been incredibly helpful and attentive to my inquiries. My overall impression of my LS 1416: BEST INVESTMENT I EVER MADE..!!
